sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Maneuver) Once per round, the character may perform the Grapple maneuver. Until the beginning of their next turn, enemies must spend 2 maneuvers instead of 1 to move from engaged range to short range of the grappling character.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Grapple</name> <number>TAL0001308</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>ben.fisher</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-01-26 16:04:43</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e94018ed2f510110e0f497eef699b6e7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-01-26 16:04:43</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
